indiyawe kashmir pranthaye kriyathmaka jamathe islam thrastha sanwidhanaya 2019 wasare marthu masa thahanam karana lada athara indiyan rupiyal koti 52 k pamana watinakamakin yuth madrasa pasal, nishchala saha chanchala depala rajasanthaka karana ladi. 200 kata adhika kriyakarin pirisak athadanguwata pathwiya. = thawath sanwidhanayaka sawisthara warthawak samagin hamuwemu = kolambaa aparadha kottasaya athadanguwata gath hajjul akbar thrasthawadiya kondesi wirahithawa nidahas kere kolambaa aparadha kottasaya magin mawanalla pradeshayedi pasugiya 2019 agosthu 25 athadanguwata gath jamaththe islami anthawadi sanwidhanaye hitapu nayaka hajjul akbar nidahas kara atha.

uthure eltitieeya yali sanwidhanaya wana bawata pasugiya kalaye gena giya pracharayanda senanayaka mahatha ilakka karagena giya mada praharayan wiya.

onere domiyarge deshapalana kapatiyekuwu robat makayar charithaya , henri moniyarge joshap prudem charithaya , saha grand wil ge wikata chithra samaga palawu “ la karikechar’ sagarawa wikata chithra kalawa wadath prachalitha wannata dayaka wiya. 1830 di thomas makliyange “ da manthli shi of karikechars ” robart seyumur deshapalana wikata chithra 1841 panch sagarawe palakala panch katunda jon teniyalge “drorapin da payilat ” katunda amarika eksath janapadaye dewid klepul jonstan , thomas nast josap keplar ha barnhad gilam wani shilpin jathyanthara katun ithihasaye salakunu thaba atha.
